text: It was my 1st experience with this app. As usual, I booked my ride. After reaching the pickup location, the auto driver demanded an extra charge of 100 in addition to the normal app fare of 350. Later, when I refused to pay the extra charge, the auto driver canceled the ride in front of us. Additionally, when I called the auto driver's number, which was already available in the booked ride details, another person answered the call. Meanwhile, the auto driver contacted me from a different n.o.

The fares are often as high as cab services from other providers, making autos an expensive choice. Drivers frequently add a ₹20 "add-on" charge, further inflating costs.The app lacks basic features like multiple stops for both autos and cabs and pre-booking for intercity rides, making it inconvenient for daily commuters. These missing options make trip planning difficult, forcing users to look for alternatives.Payment is another major issue. The app does not natively support UPI, and sometimesa
